description: Borrowed from Middle French maritime, from Latin maritimus.

adjectives.description: maritime (comparative more maritime, superlative most maritime)

entries.meaning: Relating to or connected with the sea or its uses (as navigation, commerce, etc.).
examples: I enjoy maritime activities such as yachting and deep sea diving.

entries.meaning: Bordering on the sea; living near the seacoast; coastal.
examples: the maritime states; a maritime people

entries.meaning: (zoology) Inhabiting the seashore; living coastwise; littoral. (distinguished from marine)
Of or relating to a sailor or seaman; nautical.
